text: Sources: Grizzlies open to offers on Morant move - ESPN
fullText: The Grizzlies are entertaining offers to potentially trade Ja Morant, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania. Morant, 26, is eligible to sign up to a three-year, $178 million extension this summer.

text: Owner of Swiss ski resort bar held in custody after deadly New Year's Eve fire - BBC
fullText: Jacques Moretti is being held as a potential flight risk, Swiss media reports say.

text: Russia uses its new ballistic missile in a major attack on Ukraine and a warning to West - AP News
fullText: Russia has launched a massive overnight attack on Ukraine, using hundreds of drones and dozens of missiles. Officials say at least four people have been killed. For only the second time in the nearly 4-year-old war, it used a powerful, new hypersonic missile …

text: Amazon Pharmacy starts offering Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight-loss pill - CNBC
fullText: Eligible customers with insurance can pay as little as $25 for a one-month supply of the drug, while cash-paying options start at $149 a month, Amazon said.

text: NFL Playoffs head coach rankings for 2026, from No. 1 to No. 14 - SB Nation

text: Everything We Learned About Divinity From Larian's Reddit AMA - IGN

text: Here’s what’s happening now with mortgage rates after Trump's latest push on housing affordability - CNBC
fullText: President Donald Trump posted on social media Thursday that he is instructing mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds.

text: ‘Black Mirror’ Renewed For Season 8 At Netflix - Deadline
fullText: 'Black Mirror' Season 8 is coming to Netflix from Charlie Brooker, announced as Rashida Jones and Paul Giamatti head to the Golden Globes.

text: Winter storm slams UK and France as cold snap spreads across Europe - AP News
fullText: Thousands of homes and businesses across northern France and southern England are without power and residents faced widespread travel delays after a storm swept in off the Atlantic. The low-pressure system named Storm Goretti brought high winds, rain and snow…

text: Snow and wind in the forecast for Soldier Field on Saturday night - NBC Sports
fullText: The forecast for Chicago on Saturday night indicates that Soldier Field will have exactly the kind of weather a Packers-Bears playoff game deserves.

text: BAFTA Film Awards 2026: ‘One Battle After Another’ Leads Longlists, Ahead of ‘Hamnet’ and ‘Sinners’ - The Hollywood Reporter
fullText: Josh Safdie and Timothée Chalamet's ping-pong caper 'Marty Supreme' is right behind them, as the Brits weigh in on the 2026 awards race.

text: Bill Gates warns the world going is ‘backwards’ and gives 5-year deadline before we enter a new Dark Age - Fortune
fullText: In his annual letter, Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates said over the next five years the world needs to get "back on track."

text: Pope Leo says ‘war is back in vogue’ in major address to global envoys - CNN
fullText: Pope Leo XIV has said the prohibition on countries violating one another’s borders has been “completely undermined,” in an important speech to diplomats gathered in the Vatican.

text: Massive iconic iceberg turns blue and is "on the verge of complete disintegration," NASA says - CBS News
fullText: Scientists say all signs indicate the so-called "megaberg" could be just days or weeks from totally disintegrating.

text: DHS Launches Landmark USCIS Fraud Investigation in Minnesota - USCIS (.gov)
fullText: The Department of Homeland Security and U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services have launched Operation PARRIS in Minnesota, a sweeping initiative reexamining thousands of refugee cases through new background checks and intensive verification of refugee cla…

text: Venezuela releases imprisoned opposition figures, which Trump says U.S. requested - NPR
fullText: Venezuela released a number of imprisoned high-profile opposition figures, activists and journalists, in what the government described as a gesture to "seek peace".

text: Submarine Vanishes Beneath Antarctic Ice After Uncovering Mysterious Hidden Structures Scientists Can't Explain - The Daily Galaxy
fullText: A groundbreaking Antarctic mission revealed bizarre hidden structures beneath a melting ice shelf, then the research robot vanished without a trace.

text: Scientists find new clues to why female fertility declines with age - The Washington Post
